TopicTitle: So what happened to SpannerMonkey and his mods?

Articles.Content: First of all I want to apologize because I'm just a green hand for KSP (I've just play it for 1 year). If I just say something offensive, please forgive me . Then, I want to know what happend to the user"SpannerMonkey" and the mods he made. I've heard a lot about the mods made by him, like the SM Armory、SM Marine、FSV and so on. They were really cool. But I can't find any way to get them, they were just missing from the github/spacedock/CKAN. I heard that the auther deleted them thoroughly and would never be back. Meanwhile the auther"SpannerMonkey" had not been online since 2021. Can someone in the know tell me what happened?

Reading one of the earlier threads about this...

On 2/8/2020 at 9:10 PM, HebaruSan said:

There are some updates from October (2020) on his profile explaining the situation:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/50907-spannermonkeysmce/&status=8953&type=status

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/50907-spannermonkeysmce/&status=8961&type=status

To sum up, it sounds like parts of those mods broke and needed big updates, and he took them down until he had time to fix them, which has not happened yet.

what HebaruSan said above...

it ended up that Spanner decided to leave the community, IIRC, and basically we are left with:
